name: LOADED DUNGEON
description:
get out of the maze

Keyboard/Mouse Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • left click to shoot
  • LShift to Stop Time

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Stick to move
  • Right Stick to aim
  • Right Trigger to shoot
  • Left Trigger to Stop Time

I am not saying that I want to spoil anything but u might enjoy it.

 "make a prototype just one level and polish TF out of it"
-The Awesome Shaz
